sentence: Abrams, who does not have an opponent in her upcoming Democratic primary in May, is seeking to unseat the current governor Republican Brian Kemp.
title: Florida Man (R) Claims A "Cold War" Is Coming If Stacey Abrams (D) Becomes Governor
